item.title: Static vulnerability analysis tools for Docker containers
item.description: You’re developing in Docker, and you have a container with a lot of layers when you’re done. How do you make sure that you don’t have security vulnerabilities hiding somewhere inside there, especially if you are running a container that depends on something that depends on something that depends on something else? The first step is to understand your own application, so that you can have some sense for how the dependencies that you have control over are impacted.
